tool_description:
IDfy’s Driving License Verification API instantly verifies details of a driving license by confirming them from the Government database.  

This makes your onboarding process safer, faster, and smarter. With IDfy’s DL verification API, you can be confident that the individuals you onboard hold a valid DL and have provided you with the right identity proof. 

Couple it with IDfy’s Driving License OCR API to make your identity verification and onboarding process seamless and instant.
name: Driving License Verification
title: Driving License Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.
